column4: having issues with glx based screen savers using natty.  Anyone else having this issue... System won't wake back up after going to sleep, but only with open gl screensavers again
prophetz - is your HD supported by the live CD and can you view the partition setup?
the extended is just a second type of partition.  You can have up to 4 primary partitions, and each primary can have an extended partition...

the one in the desktop is supported, unsure about the laptop, but it's a Dell so I'd be very surprised if it wasn't. I'm trying to boot from CD and view the partitions again but nothing is working since I tried Install.
